summary: Health Suite S5 (Narrative Integration) Testing Complete. All Quick Start features working correctly. 3 Health storylines (clinic, patient, healthRegulator) with 20 total steps registered. Quick Start banner renders correctly for all 3 Health roles with Copy Link, Switch Role, and Dismiss functionality.

issues: Health roles (Clinic Owner, Patient, Health Regulator) use default 'Guided demo experience' tagline instead of role-specific messaging. Consider adding Health-specific taglines to ROLE_MESSAGING in QuickStartBanner.tsx

action_items: Optional: Add Health-specific role messaging to QuickStartBanner.tsx ROLE_MESSAGING for 'Clinic Owner / Medical Director', 'Patient / Guardian' (Health context), and 'Health Regulator / Auditor'
critical_code_review_comments: 3 Health storylines registered: clinic (7 steps), patient (6 steps), healthRegulator (7 steps) = 20 total steps
Quick Start roles correctly mapped in quickstart.ts: clinic, patient, healthRegulator
URL parameter normalization handles both camelCase (healthRegulator) and lowercase (healthregulator)
QuickStartBanner renders with Copy Link, Switch Role, and Dismiss buttons
Copy Link button shows 'Copied!' feedback after click
Dismiss button hides banner and removes quickstart param from URL
Page renders correctly without quickstart parameter (no banner shown)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Health Suite S5 Narrative Integration testing complete. Quick Start URLs work: /health-demo?quickstart=clinic, /health-demo?quickstart=patient, /health-demo?quickstart=healthRegulator. All banner buttons functional. Minor enhancement: QuickStartBanner.tsx could have Health-specific role messaging added.
